info.author: Josh Burnett
info.description:
DirectoryWatcher
========================

- Monitors a directory, watching for files that are added or removed.
- Filters the list of files being watched by regex pattern matching.
- Runs one function when files are added, another (potentially different) function when files are removed.



Releases
--------

0.1, 2018-04-12
* Initial release

info.name: directorywatcher
info.summary: Cross-platform library to poll directories for added & removed files
info.html_description:
• Monitors a directory, watching for files that are added or removed.
  • Filters the list of files being watched by regex pattern matching.
  • Runs one function when files are added, another (potentially different) function when files are removed.

Releases

0.1, 2018-04-12 * Initial release
